name: Baby
greetingText: I want to take this opportunity to make up for our fights last week.
wishText:
Even when things get hard, even when we stumble, my heart still finds its way back to you.
 I donâ€™t love you lightly, I love you deeply, genuinely, and without hesitation. No matter where life takes us,
 a part of me will always belong to you. Always
